health.title: System Health Check
health.resourcesOk: All critical resources are loading correctly with proper MIME types.
health.resourcesIssues: Critical issues detected that may cause MIME type errors.
health.troubleshooting.list1: If JavaScript shows wrong MIME type, check server .htaccess configuration
health.troubleshooting.list2: If status is not 200, check that build assets are properly deployed
health.troubleshooting.list3: If you see "application/octet-stream", server headers need fixing
health.troubleshooting.list4: After deployment changes, purge CDN cache and wait 2-3 minutes
health.mimeIssue: ⚠️ MIME Type Issue: JavaScript files should have content-type "text/javascript" but got "{contentType}". This will cause "Failed to load module script" errors.
health.noManifest: No manifest found (normal in development mode)

accessibility.title: Accessibility Statement
accessibility.commitment.title: Our Commitment
accessibility.commitment.description: Consoltech is committed to ensuring digital accessibility for people with disabilities. We continuously work to improve the user experience for everyone and implement relevant accessibility standards to ensure equal access for all users.
accessibility.standards.title: Accessibility Standards
accessibility.standards.description: This website strives to conform to Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.1 Level AA. These guidelines explain how to make web content more accessible to people with disabilities.
accessibility.features.title: Accessibility Features
accessibility.features.keyboard: Full keyboard navigation support throughout the site
accessibility.features.skipLink: Skip to main content link for screen reader users
accessibility.features.headings: Proper heading structure for easy navigation
accessibility.features.focus: Clear focus indicators for interactive elements
accessibility.features.aria: ARIA labels and roles for better screen reader support
accessibility.features.responsive: Responsive design that works on all devices
accessibility.features.forms: Accessible form labels and error messages
accessibility.features.menu: Floating accessibility menu with customization options
accessibility.feedback.title: Feedback and Contact
accessibility.feedback.description: We welcome your feedback on the accessibility of this website. If you encounter any accessibility barriers or have suggestions for improvement, please contact us:
accessibility.feedback.response: We aim to respond to accessibility feedback within 2 business days.
accessibility.limitations.title: Known Limitations
accessibility.limitations.description: Despite our efforts to ensure accessibility, there may be some limitations. We are working to address these issues:
accessibility.limitations.thirdParty: Some third-party content may not be fully accessible
accessibility.limitations.legacy: Older content is being updated to meet current standards
accessibility.limitations.multimedia: Some multimedia content may lack captions or transcripts
accessibility.assessment.title: Assessment Approach
accessibility.assessment.description: Consoltech assessed the accessibility of this website through:
accessibility.assessment.guidelines: Review against WCAG 2.1 Level AA guidelines

index.cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Business?
index.cta.description: Join thousands of successful businesses worldwide who trust CONSOLTECH for their technology distribution needs.
index.aboutSection.title: About Consoltech
index.aboutSection.description: Founded in 2001 in Tel Aviv, Consoltech is a trusted importer, exporter, and distributor delivering high-demand consumer electronics and gaming products to retailers, resellers, and wholesale clients across global markets. As a VIP+ Handelot member, we prioritize reliability, transparency, and fast, flexible logistics.
